channel.title: Using items with objects/npcs
channel.description: im using my server, Omegascape (pvpscape source) i dont have the voids cases ect to make items with objects if you catch my drift... basicly, i dont know how to do it..... its confusing to explain... anyone help? :confused: also, im trying to make a ::roll command. im trying to make it so when the player says ::roll, they say a random number between one and one hundred. i tryed using [code] } else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("roll")) { sendMessage("You roll"); pSay(" misc.random(25);");[/code] but the player says misc.random(25); what should i add? to make him say a random number like 13? anybody?

item.title: Using items with objects/npcs

} else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("roll")) { sendMessage("You roll"); pSay(" misc.random(25);");
